item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.

item.title: As the Trump Administration and States Push Health Data Sharing, Familiar Challenges Surface
item.description: Despite billions of tax dollars and two decades of effort invested in improving health care data sharing, Americans’ medical records often remain silo...

item.title: ‘Sick to My Stomach’: Trump Distorts Facts on Autism, Tylenol, and Vaccines, Scientists Say
item.description: The White House’s autism announcement exaggerates links to Tylenol, misleads on vaccines, and sets back the field by ignoring decades of research, sci...

item.title: “Me siento mal”: científicos dicen que Trump distorsiona datos sobre el autismo, el Tylenol y las vacunas
item.description: Expertos en autismo de los Centros para el Control y Prevención de Enfermedades no fueron consultados para el esperado anuncio de la Casa Blanca.
